home.body_1: With its elegant architecture and modern amenities, each apartment at Rosalia is a tranquil sanctuary, promising residents a lifestyle of comfort and sophistication. Whether you're enjoying the scenic views from your window or exploring the charm of Varennes, Rosalia provides the perfect backdrop for a life well-lived. Welcome to your new home.
home.body_2: In Varennes, extraordinary living spaces await. Seize this chance to immerse yourself in our vibrant community and experience the essence of refined living firsthand.

info.section3_p4: Near Public Transport to Longueuil Metro
info.section4_p1: 40% MORE ECO EFFICIENT THAN CANADIAN BUILDING CODE
